Class SpritePlayer

java.lang.Object
  SpritePlayer

public class SpritePlayer
extends java.lang.Object

Loads Sprite and returns the sprites to set as images

Version:
beta 1.0
Author:
David Liu

Constructor Summary
SpritePlayer(java.lang.String name, int amount)
          Makes a new sprite player and imports all the sprite for given file name
Name must follow format of .png, and also named with NAME#.png
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getImageName(int index)
          Returns the image's name

          Returns the image to display

Constructor Detail

SpritePlayer

public SpritePlayer(java.lang.String name,
                    int amount)
Makes a new sprite player and imports all the sprite for given file name
Name must follow format of .png, and also named with NAME#.png

Parameters:
name - Name or path of the file in general, no need for ".png" or number
amount - The amount of pictures for this set
